site.title: PPI AIU - Indonesian Students Association
site.description: Indonesian student organization at Albukhary International University

hero.description: Building bridges, fostering excellence, and strengthening Indonesian community worldwide

about.title: About
about.description: Dedicated to building a strong Indonesian community at Albukhary International University through unity, excellence, and cultural preservation.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the leading Indonesian student organization that inspires academic excellence and strengthens Indonesian cultural identity on the international stage.

mission.title: Our Mission
items: Facilitate adaptation of new Indonesian students
Organize quality cultural and academic activities
Promote Indonesian values in the international community

academic.description: Tutoring, mentoring programs, and study guidance to help students achieve academic success.

cultural.title: Cultural Activities
cultural.description: Events to preserve and introduce Indonesian culture to the international community.

social.title: Social Support
social.description: Helping new students adapt and integrate into the AIU community.

networking.description: Connecting students with alumni for career opportunities and professional development.
